item.title: About
item.description: When did we start When I took the IELTS in April 2018, I curated the collection of IELTS preparation video series, resources (materials and notes) and practice activities. Who can use and how can it be used We post reviews of various resources for Reading, Listening, Writing and Speaking sections in IELTS. All the content is readily available and without signing up for any subscriptions. We recommend the readers to only use the reviewed notes and video series for preparing to IELTS test and not redistribute it.

item.title: Credits
item.description: The team admires these presenters and organizations, who hosted the invaluable IELTS learning video series, lessons, and resources on the web to students as free content. Content Owners Presenter Website Margot Politis (ABC) Study English: IELTS Preparation The team would also like to thank the other fellow content aggregators, who aggregated great IELTS resources. They made our work more presentable to readers.
